title: Courses in Ireland
content:
Greetings,

I’m planning moving to Ireland this year thus I’m looking for any design related course around. Specific courses would be great too, like typography, photography or just graphic design.

It doesn’t have to be in Dublin, since I’m still planning the trip. Actually it would be interesting to hear about courses um Scotland also. I left England off because it’s too expensive.

I really appreciate your help.
author: souljacker

comments.content:
Gustavo

Ireland is like heaven to me but for the reason that my wife is Irish and her parents live there. I’ll correspond with my wife’s sister, who took very good courses in Dublin in web design, and get back to you.

Jordan

Gustavo

Hi again. Ok, here are 3 places you might look into. Dublin Institute of Technology, [www.dit.ie](http://web.archive.org/web/20060628172948/http:/www.dit.ie/), NCAD National College of Art and Design at [www.ncad.ie](http://web.archive.org/web/20060628172948/http:/www.ncad.ie/) and the Dun Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology at [www.iadt.ie](http://web.archive.org/web/20060628172948/http:/www.iadt.ie/). Take a look at all of them, though the last has a very fine reputation. My wife went to NCAD where she learned to be a great weaver, hand-woven fabrics. Good luck.  
Jordan

If you can track down Matha Standun, he’s your man.

hhp
